name: Iheb Ben Taieb

experience.title: Software Developer (Part-time)
experience.description: Developed and deployed responsive websites using Svelte, Express, and NodeJs. Implemented SEO optimization strategies to improve client site visibility. experience.description: Contributed to full-stack development using MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and MongoDB database schemas. Developed secure authentication systems using JSON Web Tokens (JWT).

summary: Telecommunications Engineering student at Sup’Com with strong expertise in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Computer Vision. Experienced in developing AI-driven MLOps solutions and full-stack applications with a proven track record in hackathons. Seeking an internship opportunity to apply my machine learning and deep learning skills to solve complex real-world problems.
